webscript.description:
Gets a list of change log events and optionally the ACLs applied to the changed objects.

Inputs:

ID objectId
(Optional) Integer maxItems: The maximum number of entries to return (Optional) Boolean includeACL: Include the ACLs applied to the object reference in the change event?
(Optional) String changeLogToken: the token of the change log entry to start from
list.
Outputs:

Result set specified by arguments

Notes:

If “changeLogToken” is specified, the changes returned should start from the specified token. Otherwise, the changes will start from the first available change.
If “maxItems” is specified, only that number of changes will be returned and paging links embedding other change log tokens will allow navigation to further changes.
